snippet.title: Construction Bob Escapes From Hell [PC/DOS - Gameplay]
snippet.description: A little platformer game from 1995, reminiscent of arcade classics like Donkey Kong. The same 3 levels over and over again, but with increasing difficulty. Collectibles included (those rubies are essential in escaping from hell). May be fun and challenging at first, but sadly - it gets old kinda quick.
